KitKat::
Her survival instincts kicked in. She used what energy she had to 
stand up on all fours. She took a few steps and stopped. She stood 
and tried to keep her balance. She took a few more steps, then side 
stepped and almost fell against Blackfang as she fell to the ground. 
She groaned and whimpered in pain. Her optics flickered as the reason 
for the pain suddenly became evident. Her belly was swollen. Really 
swollen. The smell of mech fluid was strong around her. She was 
leaking internally. 



--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "raccoon7679" <raccoon7679@y...> wrote:
> Cam::
> 
> She heard the voice and growled in her little fox growl. It wasn't 
> intimidating, in fact, it was almost cute. She growled at the 
> voice. "No, You leave her alone. We found her. She's ours. Get your 
> own bot. Besides, she's a canine like us. We found her. We keep 
her. 
> Don't you know the rules of Finder's Keeper's?"  She went stomping 
> infront of the fallen wolf bot and stood over the tail of the bot. 
> She spoke to the fallen bot. "Don't worry. I'll save you." Her 
little 
> fox kit ears down and her little teeth bared. She raised her back 
and 
> tried as hard as she could to look mean.
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@y...> 
wrote:
> > : : SharpClaw : :
> > SharpClaw stayed back, observing KitKat and the bots. KitKat 
needed

like

> though, they were not Predacons.
> > SharpClaw: Please allow me to take her. She needs help by her own 
> people. You have not harmed her so I will not attack you. SharpClaw

was

to

She
